      • setJasperPrint

        public void setJasperPrint(@NotNull
                           @NotNull ArrayList<net.sf.jasperreports.engine.JasperPrint> jasperPrint)
                    throws NullNotAllowedException
        Set the JasperPrint engine.Whene o getJasperPrint or generate the report if the not seted it will be setted automataclly. However the RRProperties parameters, jasper file and driver properies must be seted or will throw a exception, because JasperPrint can not be instanciated without this parameters. This method is only if you wont to define your one instance for any reazon This will be set automatically
        Parameters:
        jasperPrint -
        Throws:
        NullNotAllowedException

      • getJasperPrint

        @NotNull
public @NotNull ArrayList<net.sf.jasperreports.engine.JasperPrint> getJasperPrint()
                                                                                     throws DataSourceException,
                                                                                            net.sf.jasperreports.engine.JRException,
                                                                                            NullNotAllowedException,
                                                                                            RRException
        Get the JasperReport engine When o getJasperPrint or you generate the report if the not seted it will be setted automataclly.However the RRProperties parameters, jasper file and driver properies must be seted or will throw a exception, because JasperPrint can not be instanciated without this parameters.This method exist to be possible to manipulate the JasperPrint before the generation of the report
        Returns:
        Throws:
        DataSourceException
        net.sf.jasperreports.engine.JRException
